cards.name: The Fool
cards.upright: Fresh start, leap of faith, curious heart. Hold the vision. Begin simple. Trust you’ll learn by moving.
cards.reversed: Hesitation, fear of missteps. Make the first imperfect move; adjust after.

cards.name: The Magician
cards.upright: Focused will, skills activating, making it real. Choose one clear outcome today. Use what you already have.
cards.reversed: Scattered energy, self-doubt. Focus on one tool, one task. Prove momentum to yourself.

cards.name: The High Priestess
cards.upright: Inner knowing, quiet wisdom, sacred pause. Listen first. Journal what your body whispers.
cards.reversed: Noise over intuition. Turn down external input. Trust your inner signal.

cards.name: The Empress
cards.upright: Nurture, creativity, abundance growing. Feed your art and your body. Receive support.
cards.reversed: Creative block, self-neglect. Nourish before producing. Rest is productive.

cards.name: The Emperor
cards.upright: Structure, leadership, healthy boundaries. Decide the rules of your day. Keep them kind and firm.
cards.reversed: Rigidity, control issues. Loosen the rules. Lead through trust, not tension.

cards.name: The Hierophant
cards.upright: Tradition, guidance, learning the keys. Find a mentor or method. Integrate what resonates.
cards.reversed: Outgrowing old beliefs. Keep the wisdom, release the cage. Craft your own ritual.

cards.name: The Lovers
cards.upright: Aligned choice, union, values harmony. Choose what loves you back and matches your values.
cards.reversed: Misalignment, people-pleasing. Choose the path that honors your needs, kindly.

cards.name: The Chariot
cards.upright: Momentum, discipline, victory through focus. Set a direction. Say no to detours for 24 hours.
cards.reversed: Drift, willpower leaks. Simplify goals. Remove one distraction that steers you off.

cards.name: Strength
cards.upright: Calm courage, compassion, gentle power. Lead with patience. Meet fear with breath and kindness.
cards.reversed: Inner critic loud, patience thin. Speak to yourself like a friend. Breathe first, then act.

cards.name: The Hermit
cards.upright: Solitude, truth-seeking, inner light. Unplug. One quiet hour reveals the next step.
cards.reversed: Isolation, overthinking. Reconnect gently. Share one truth with a safe person.

cards.name: Wheel of Fortune
cards.upright: Cycles turning, luck, timing opens. Cooperate with change. Pivot with grace.
cards.reversed: Resistance to change. Stop wrestling the river. Take the next doable step.

cards.name: Justice
cards.upright: Truth, fairness, cause and effect. Balance the scales. Make the honest correction.
cards.reversed: Avoiding accountability. Own your part. Make a fair amends today.

cards.name: The Hanged Man
cards.upright: Surrender, new perspective, sacred pause. Release control for a moment. Let clarity arrive.
cards.reversed: Stuckness without insight. Choose a time limit for pausing, then move.

cards.name: Death
cards.upright: Endings, clearing, profound renewal. Allow what’s done to finish. Make space for life to enter.
cards.reversed: Clinging, fear of endings. Let one small thing go. Create space for renewal.

cards.name: Temperance
cards.upright: Healing, moderation, divine blending. Mix rest with action. Find the middle that works today.
cards.reversed: Imbalance, all-or-nothing. Blend, don’t binge. Find a 60% workable mix.

cards.name: The Devil
cards.upright: Attachments, temptation, reclaiming power. Name the hook. Choose one tiny freedom now.
cards.reversed: Breaking chains, recovery starting. Ask for support. Swap one habit for a kinder one.

cards.name: The Tower
cards.upright: Sudden change, truth strikes, liberation. What falls frees you. Build on honesty, not habit.
cards.reversed: Aftershock, rebuilding. Stabilize basics: sleep, food, breath. Rebuild slowly.

cards.name: The Star
cards.upright: Hope, guidance, gentle recovery. Refill your well. Follow the small light you trust.
cards.reversed: Hope flickers, self-belief thin. Tend the spark. Repeat one gentle affirmation.

cards.name: The Moon
cards.upright: Mystery, intuition, navigating shadows. Move slowly. Ask dreams and signs for help.
cards.reversed: Confusion, anxiety, illusion. Ground in facts. Move by lantern, not floodlight.

cards.name: The Sun
cards.upright: Joy, clarity, vitality, success. Say yes to what’s warm and simple. Celebrate a win.
cards.reversed: Burnout, forced cheer. Rest in honest light. Joy returns when you do.

cards.name: Judgement
cards.upright: Awakening, calling, forgiveness. Answer the call. Release the past version of you.
cards.reversed: Doubt about your calling. Release perfection. Start where you stand.

cards.name: The World
cards.upright: Completion, integration, next-level wholeness. Close the loop with gratitude. Prepare your next chapter.
cards.reversed: Almost there, loose ends. Finish the last 10%. Celebrate the closure.

cards.name: Ace of Wands
cards.upright: Ace of Wands: seed moment, new potential ignites. Themes: energy, purpose, creative fire.
cards.reversed: Ace of Wands (reversed): hesitation blocks a fresh start. Shadow: pace, burnout, scattered effort.

cards.name: Two of Wands
cards.upright: Two of Wands: balance and choice—plan then move. Themes: energy, purpose, creative fire.
cards.reversed: Two of Wands (reversed): indecision; simplify the options. Shadow: pace, burnout, scattered effort.

cards.name: Three of Wands
cards.upright: Three of Wands: collaboration and steady progress. Themes: energy, purpose, creative fire.
cards.reversed: Three of Wands (reversed): miscommunication; align expectations. Shadow: pace, burnout, scattered effort.

cards.name: Four of Wands
cards.upright: Four of Wands: stability; protect your energy wisely. Themes: energy, purpose, creative fire.
cards.reversed: Four of Wands (reversed): stuck or hoarding energy; loosen. Shadow: pace, burnout, scattered effort.

cards.name: Five of Wands
cards.upright: Five of Wands: challenge teaches resilience and skill. Themes: energy, purpose, creative fire.
cards.reversed: Five of Wands (reversed): conflict drains; choose growth over drama. Shadow: pace, burnout, scattered effort.

cards.name: Six of Wands
cards.upright: Six of Wands: give/receive in healthy flow. Themes: energy, purpose, creative fire.
cards.reversed: Six of Wands (reversed): imbalanced giving; restore fairness. Shadow: pace, burnout, scattered effort.

cards.name: Seven of Wands
cards.upright: Seven of Wands: patience; tend what you planted. Themes: energy, purpose, creative fire.
cards.reversed: Seven of Wands (reversed): impatience; progress is still progress. Shadow: pace, burnout, scattered effort.

cards.name: Eight of Wands
cards.upright: Eight of Wands: practice and mastery through repetition. Themes: energy, purpose, creative fire.
cards.reversed: Eight of Wands (reversed): busywork; refine your craft with purpose. Shadow: pace, burnout, scattered effort.

cards.name: Nine of Wands
cards.upright: Nine of Wands: self-respect, fruits of your effort. Themes: energy, purpose, creative fire.
cards.reversed: Nine of Wands (reversed): self-doubt; acknowledge how far you’ve come. Shadow: pace, burnout, scattered effort.

cards.name: Ten of Wands
cards.upright: Ten of Wands: culmination; share the harvest. Themes: energy, purpose, creative fire.
cards.reversed: Ten of Wands (reversed): overload; release what’s complete. Shadow: pace, burnout, scattered effort.

cards.name: Page of Wands
cards.upright: Page of Wands: curiosity; learn by doing. Themes: energy, purpose, creative fire.
cards.reversed: Page of Wands (reversed): restless; start small and consistent. Shadow: pace, burnout, scattered effort.

cards.name: Knight of Wands
cards.upright: Knight of Wands: momentum; channel drive with care. Themes: energy, purpose, creative fire.
cards.reversed: Knight of Wands (reversed): impulsive; direct the charge wisely. Shadow: pace, burnout, scattered effort.

cards.name: Queen of Wands
cards.upright: Queen of Wands: embodied wisdom; nurture what matters. Themes: energy, purpose, creative fire.
cards.reversed: Queen of Wands (reversed): inward focus needed; refill your cup. Shadow: pace, burnout, scattered effort.

cards.name: King of Wands
cards.upright: King of Wands: lead with clarity; set the tone. Themes: energy, purpose, creative fire.
cards.reversed: King of Wands (reversed): control without care; lead by example. Shadow: pace, burnout, scattered effort.

cards.upright: Ace of Cups: seed moment, new potential ignites. Themes: feelings, relationships, intuition.
cards.reversed: Ace of Cups (reversed): hesitation blocks a fresh start. Shadow: emotional spill, avoidance.
